welcome.title: It's Your Opinion That Matters
welcome.description: Say it your way. Put it on video, share your photos, use your words.

register.return: Return to the Sezz You welcome page
register.terms_conditions: We agree to the following User Agreement
register.already_member: Already have an account? Sign In
register.username_helper: You need to have a SezzYou individual user account to create a SezzYou group user account
register.personal_desc: Please ensure your Personal Details are correct, as these details are not easily changeable after registration.
register.personal_desc_1: Your Date of Birth, Age, and Gender will not be displayed anywhere on the Sezz You platform. These details are only used to determine your eligibility to vote in certain polls, as well as improve your overall experience on the Sezz You platform.
register.location_desc: Other than selecting a Country, providing your complete office address at registration is optional. These details may be added later, in your account area, if you choose to do so. No address information, or any other contact information, is displayed publicly unless you expressly allow for its display
register.password_helper: Your password needs to be at least 6 characters, can only contain letters and numbers, and is case sensitive.
register.listening_desc: We ask that you select one or more users to listen to when you create your account. This will immediately populate your home page. You can then add and remove users (to listen to) after registration. We have displayed the top 12 most popular users here.
register.email_confirm: We will send you Email Confirmation
register.user_available: The username you have selected is available.
register.residence_desc: Your Residence will determine your eligibility to vote in certain polls, as well as improve your overall experience on the Sezz You platform.
register.interests_desc: To make sure you have a great SezzYou experience, please tell us some of the things that interest you. You can change your Interests in your account settings later on, so you needn't spend too much time now.
register.note: Please note: Operating more than one individual account, or impersonating another person, is a violation of SezzYou's Terms. Offending accounts will be immediately disabled.
register.mobile_cell_desc: To ensure the integrity, legitimacy and authenticity of the Individual users on the SezzYou site, we send a 4-digit code to the registree's mobile/cell phone to finalise the registration process.
register.interests_desc_1: Click on any Interest category to reveal the Interest sub-categories that you can select.
register.list_start_desc: Please note that your mobile/cell phone number:
register.list_end_desc: Please select your Country below, enter your mobile/cell phone number, and click 'Send Code'.
register.list_item1: Will only be used for this SezzYou account registration (and account closing)
register.list_item2: Can only be used to create one (1) SezzYou Individual Account
register.list_item3: Will not be displayed anywhere on the site
register.list_item4: Will not be given to any third parties
register.list_item5: Will not be used for any other purpose

resetpassword.description: A Forgot password email has been sent to your account. If you have not received the Forgot password email, please check you 'Spam' or 'Bulk Email' folder.

validation.passowrd_length: Password length must be minimum 6 character
validation.password_confpass_not_match: Password and repeat password not match
validation.username_valid: Your username must be between 5 and 20 characters, and can only contain letters and numbers.
validation.username_min_length: Username length must be minimum 5 character
validation.username_max_length: Username length must be maximum 20 character
